    • Server

      public Server(int port)
      Server constructor Loads the previously saved games
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Default constructor Checks if the port passed as parameter is valid. If it is, it starts the server
      Parameters:
      args - the port on which to run the server

    • isNumeric

      private static boolean isNumeric(String str)
      Check if the string passed as a parameter is a number
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      Returns:
      true if the string is a number

    • startServer

      public void startServer() throws IOException
      Starts the server Creates a server socket, bound to the specified port For every connection accepted, it creates a new UserHandler to which it passes the accepted socket and a reference to this instance
      Throws:
      IOException - signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred

    • loadSavedGames

      private void loadSavedGames()
      Loads previously saved games

      Creates a gameHandler to which it passes the previous game
      Throws:

    • removeGameStartingListener

      public void removeGameStartingListener(GameReadyListener l)

    • enqueueUser

      public void enqueueUser(String nickname, GameMode selectedGameMode, PlayersNumber selectedPlayersNumber, GameReadyListener l) throws InvalidPlayerNumberException
      Parameters:
      nickname - the user's nickname
      selectedGameMode - the chosen gameMode
      selectedPlayersNumber - the selected number of players
      l - the gameReadyListener
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNumberException - Signals that in GameControllerBuilder the specified PlayerCount does not match the actual number of player passed to the builder

    • enqueueUser

      public void enqueueUser(String nickname, GameMode selectedGameMode, PlayersNumber selectedPlayersNumber) throws InvalidPlayerNumberException
      Enqueue the user to the lobby corresponding to the gameMode and number of players previously selected The user must be already present in the allUser list
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      selectedGameMode - the selected gameMode
      selectedPlayersNumber - the selected playersNumber
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNumberException - Signals that in GameControllerBuilder the specified PlayerCount does not match the actual number of player passed to the builder

    • enqueueUser

      private void enqueueUser(User user, GameHandlerBuilder builder, List<GameHandler> runningGames) throws InvalidPlayerNumberException
      Adds the player to the lobby corresponding to the gameMode and number of players previously selected If the lobby is full, a new gameHandler is created and added to the list of running games. The lobby then is emptied
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      builder - the gameHandlerBuilder corresponding to the gameMode and number of players previously selected
      runningGames - the list of running games
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNumberException - Signals that in GameControllerBuilder the specified PlayerCount does not match the actual number of player passed to the builder

    • checkNicknameStatus

      public NicknameStatus checkNicknameStatus(String nickname)
      Checks if the chosen nickname is already used or if belongs to a previously disconnected player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the chosen nickname
      Returns:
      the nicknameStatus

      private Optional<GameHandler> getGameByPlayer(String nickname)
      Returns the gameHandler in which appears the player with the wanted nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      Returns:
      Optional

    • getGame

      private Optional<GameHandler> getGame(UUID uuid)
      Return the gameHandler associated with the game having the seek uuid
      Parameters:
      uuid - the uuid
      Returns:
      Optional

    • removeGame

      private void removeGame(UUID uuid)
      Remove the gameHandler associated with the game that has the uuid passed as parameter If the uuid is not present, it does nothing
      Parameters:
      uuid - the game uuid

    • reconnectUser

      public void reconnectUser(String nickname, Endpoint endpoint)

      public void addUser(User user)
      Adds a user to the map containing the players
      Parameters:
      user - the user to add

    • getUser

      public Optional<User> getUser(String nickname)
      Check if a chosen nickname belongs already to another user
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to verify
      Returns:
      Optional if the nickname chosen belongs already to another user

    • removeUser

      public boolean removeUser(String nickname)
      Tries to remove a user The user must not be in an active game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the user's nickname
      Returns:
      true if the removal is successful, false if not (user does not exist or is in an active game)

    • removeUserHandler

      public void removeUserHandler(UserHandler userHandler)
      Removes from the userHandlers list the userHandler
      Parameters:
      userHandler - the userHandler to remove

    • onGameEnding

      public void onGameEnding(UUID uuid)
      If a game has ended, the corresponding gameHandler is remove from the list of running games If the users are still online, they are added to a new userHandler. If they are not, they are removed from the list of players. Finally, the game is removed from the saved games
      Specified by:
      onGameEnding in interface GameEndingListener
      Parameters:
      uuid - the game uuid
